ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab tests commonly used for a blood/serum/plasma creatinine test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood/serum/plasma for creatinine. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to 'Laboratory Test, Result' or 'Laboratory Test, Order' datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Creatinine lab test using the source of blood/serum/plasma with a reporting scale of mass/volume.),(Exclusion Criteria: Creatinine lab test using a non-blood/serum/plasma source of blood or a measurement outside of moles/volume)
